publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-33.1 Patrick Harvie: Opposition to Ship-to-Ship Oil Transfer in Firth of Forth—As an amendment to motion (S3M-33) in the name of Iain Gray, insert at end "recognises that, as a result of discussions between the Green Party and the SNP, the Executive has the tools at its disposal to take action on this issue, which the previous Executive persistently did not take, and welcomes this development as an example of the co-operation which will become possible if all parties in the Parliament bring a constructive approach to their work." Supported by: Tricia Marwick*

S3M-33.1 Patrick Harvie: Opposition to Ship-to-Ship Oil Transfer in Firth of Forth—As an amendment to motion (S3M-33) in the name of Iain Gray, insert at end "recognises that, as a result of discussions between the Green Party and the SNP, the Executive has the tools at its disposal to take action on this issue, which the previous Executive persistently did not take, and welcomes this development as an example of the co-operation which will become possible if all parties in the Parliament bring a constructive approach to their work." Supported by: Tricia Marwick
S3M-33.1 Opposition to Ship-to-Ship Oil Transfer in Firth of Forth (lodged on 17 May 2007) Stuart McMillan*, Robin Harper*, Jamie Hepburn*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-33.1 Opposition to Ship-to-Ship Oil Transfer in Firth of Forth (lodged on 17 May 2007) Bob Doris*
S3M-33.1 Opposition to Ship-to-Ship Oil Transfer in Firth of Forth (lodged on 17 May 2007) Bill Wilson*

S3M-33.1 Opposition to Ship-to-Ship Oil Transfer in Firth of Forth (lodged on 17 May 2007) Alasdair Allan*
